1.0.name: wordpress/icecast-now-playing
1.0.description: Displays Icecast server connection statistics for a given mount point. Allows visitors to listen to your audio stream from your blog, view the current tracks playing, and number of listeners. To see the plugin in action visit http://www.galwayland.com/icecast-now-playing/.
